title: PRAW: How to get submission text?
author: d6kx9
content:
I can't seem to figure out how to get a submission's text or link. The docs don't cover that. Anyone know?

TIA

comments.author: co7mq
comments.body:
submission.selftext and submission.url

When looking for an object's properties, try doing dir(object), and it will show you a list of its methods and attributes.
